name: Killer Plants (rwiseman)
description:
A top-down shooter, Killer Plants puts you in charge of saving your farm animals before your wild killer plants destroy you or your animals. Be careful, you'll need to watch out for growing wild vines that make your mission increasingly difficult. How many animals can you save before it's too late? Or will you choose to just burn it all down to survive?

How To Play

  • Use keys to move player
  • Point gun with mouse
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to pick up animal friends and drop off in pen
